summary:
•	Results driven - commitment to quality and achievement of set goals.  

•	Five (5) years’ experience in Operations and Retail.

•	Hard working and proactive team player.

•	Excellent communication skills and proven integrity.

•	Proven experience in handling customer queries and complaints as well as providing appropriate and quick solutions to clients.  

•	Believer in continuous improvements, increase productivities and efficiency

•	Confidentiality 

•	Objectivity and Flexibility

•	Accustomed to working with senior management

•	Skilled negotiator in a commercial environment,

•	Able to work well under pressure with no supervision in a busy environment.

profile_positions.description:
•	To post all the internal and external transfers.
•	Management of the store as well as distributing all the needs to the staffs.

•	Daily reconciliation of all the internal accounts under the branch
•	Presenting the monthly report of all the internal accounts
•	Coding invoices
•	Dealing with supplier queries
•	Communicating effectively and confidently at all levels, over the phone, face to face and by email. 
•	Helping non finance mangers to approve invoices on time.
•	Manage all and suppliers accounts in a timely and accurate manner making sure invoices are paid on time. 
•	Assisting with the weekly bacs run and sending out remittance
profile_positions.title: Payment Officer

profile_positions.description:
•	Balance currency, coin, and checks in cash drawers at ends of shifts, and calculate daily transactions.
•	Cash checks and pay out money after verifying that signatures are correct, that written and numerical amounts agree, and that accounts have sufficient funds.
•	Receive checks and cash for deposit, verify amounts, and check accuracy of deposit slips.
•	Examine checks for endorsements and to verify other information such as dates, bank names, identification of the persons receiving payments and the legality of the documents.
•	Enter customers' transactions into computers in order to record transactions and issue computer-generated receipts.

•	Count currency, coins, and checks received, by hand or using currency-counting machine, in order to prepare them for deposit or shipment to branch banks or the Federal Reserve Bank.

•	Identify transaction mistakes when debits and credits do not balance.

•	 Prepare and verify cashier's checks.

•	Arrange monies received in cash boxes and coin dispensers according to denomination
profile_positions.title: Bank Teller

profile_positions.description:
•	 Compiles settlement data and submits checks, drafts, and other items to clearinghouse association for exchange and settlement with other banks: Sorts items into bundles, lists items, and totals amounts.

•	 Posts totals to clearinghouse settlement sheet.

•	Deliver items to clearinghouse.
•	 Accepts items from clearinghouse that have been drawn on own bank and posts totals on settlement sheet.
•	 Submits sheet to clearinghouse for verification.

•	  Maintain telephone contact with bank personnel and others to locate missing checks, correct errors, and reconcile differences in records.
profile_positions.title: CLEARING OFFICER
